name: Goat Rider (itch)
description:
After long rainy days everywhere is flooded with water, and it seems impossible to walk in the prairie with your shoes dry and clean. With help of a goat, you must get across the land to deliver an important letter safely. Meanwhile, eating food is the only thing your goat has any interest in. Lure the goat with a basketful of apples to take you to your destination. Luckily, your basket is so small you need only one apple to make the basket look full.

Goat Rider is a puzzle game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46 with a theme "keep it alive".
